error.title: Scene setting
error.description:
## Invalid input node
VDB input must have the same number of VDBs, points, primitives and vertices as output.
error.detail:
### __Detailed Info__ (optional)
A VDB is an inherited type of Prim, holds the following data: - Primitives: 1 - Points: 1 - Vertices: 1 - VDBs: 1
